resources.name: Auth Cookies
resources.description: Prepare cookies for auth request

resources.name: Auth Request
resources.description:
Perform authorization request to get token  
Requires cookies from the [Auth Cookies](https://github.com/techchrism/valorant-api-docs/tree/trunk/docs/Riot%20Auth/POST%20Auth%20Cookies.md) stage. The token can be found in the `uri` property.  

Variables:
 - `{username}`: The player username / email for signing in
 - `{password}`: The player password for signing in

resources.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
resources.description:
Submits a multi-factor authentication code for login  

Variables:
 - `{mfa code}`: The code received from the secondary location (email)

resources.name: Cookie Reauth
resources.description:
Get a new token using the cookies from a previous authorization request  
Use the saved cookies from [Auth Request](https://github.com/techchrism/valorant-api-docs/tree/trunk/docs/Riot%20Auth/PUT%20Auth%20Request.md). The token can be found from the url this request redirects to.  
Recommended to use this endpoint instead of storing the password and sending it again.
